title: Thought Experiment: The World’s Most Comfortable, Vibration-Damped Gravel Bike
content:
A gravel bike can't offer comfort even remotely close to that offered by a mountain bike. How outrageous of me to think otherwise, right? Wrong. Maybe.

Read the full article at Thought Experiment: The World’s Most Comfortable, Vibration-Damped Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
